# knownBias

## Summary

Records the biases that the dataset is known to encompass.


## Description

KnownBias is a free form text field that describes the different biases that the dataset encompasses.


## Metadata

    - name: knownBias
    - Nature: DataProperty
    - Range: xsd:string
